channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Near end of Chateris Road/Hazelmere Road, 31st December
item.description:
Parts of the road, including sidewalks and gullies have piles of leaves and rubbish which need to be swept. Plants, weeds and saplings thriving in the disorder and growing in cracks amongst the rubbish and leaves which isn’t good for the pavement.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charteris Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 1-3 denmark street, 31st December
item.description:
The vault lights are badly damaged and have been regularly falling apart into our bar below. and falling on top of people. they are also leaking and dripping more and more. this need sorting asap as its a health and safety issue within our bar

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Flitcroft Street, Bloomsbury, Greater London

item.title: Litter on Tabard street, 31st December
item.description:
There is litter including empty plastic bag, food packaging and plastic bottles on the road, pavement and green space on Tabard Street next to the park area and the rental bikes. Fixmystreet stated it was cleared up yesterday, but the litter is still there. It stills needs to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tabard Street, The Borough, Greater London
